text: Three different NASCAR races have been known as the Miller 400: * For the race at Michigan International Speedway in 1985, 1996 and 1997, see Consumers Energy 400 * For the race at Richmond International Raceway in 1996, see Federated Auto Parts 400 * For the Busch Series race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in 1985, see Drive for the Cure 250
title: Miller 400
